mapper.select: SELECT dep.exam_seq as examRef, dep.section_ref as sectionRef, dep.type as type, dep.start_time as startTime, #{student} as studentRef, dep.num_of_questions as total, SUM(ans.correct = 'Y') as correct, SUM(ans.correct = 'N') as failed FROM dt_exam_papers dep JOIN dt_exam_answers ans ON dep.exam_seq = ans.exam_ref WHERE dep.student_ref = #{student} GROUP BY dep.exam_seq;
